summary: Most federal funding can only be used for a certain amount of time. But the Department of Energy (DOE) receives billions of dollars annually that are not time-limited and can be carried over each year. In 1996, we reported concerns that DOE carried over more than it needed to—tying up resources. In response, DOE developed thresholds to monitor programs' carryover balances. This report examines two...
title: Financial Management: DOE and NNSA Have Opportunities to Improve Management of Carryover Balances
